name: Apple HomePod (2nd Gen) Midnight Speaker
description: Experience immersive sound with the Apple HomePod (2nd Gen) Midnight Speaker. This high-fidelity smart speaker delivers incredible audio quality and advanced Siri integration. Whether you're enjoying music, podcasts, or controlling your smart home, the HomePod makes it effortless and enjoyable.

name: Apple iPhone 13 - With Apple International Warranty
description: Elevate your mobile experience with the Apple iPhone 13. Packed with cutting-edge technology, exceptional camera features, and the reliability of Apple's international warranty, this smartphone is designed to meet your every need. Capture stunning photos, stay connected, and enjoy the power of the iPhone 13.

name: Apple Watch Series 5 GPS + Cellular - Space Gray Aluminum Case
description: Stay connected and monitor your health with the Apple Watch Series 5 GPS + Cellular. This smartwatch offers a seamless blend of style and functionality. With GPS and cellular connectivity, heart rate monitoring, and a stunning Space Gray Aluminum case, it's the perfect companion for an active and connected lifestyle.

name: New Apple iPad 10.2-inch 2020 (Latest Model, 8th Generation) - 32GB & 128GB
description: Discover the world of productivity and entertainment with the new Apple iPad, 8th generation. Available in both 32GB and 128GB models, this iPad features a stunning Retina display, powerful performance, and support for the latest apps and features. Whether you're working, learning, or simply enjoying multimedia, the iPad has you covered.

name: Google Nest 3rd Generation Thermostat
description: The Google Nest 3rd Generation Thermostat is a smart and energy-efficient solution for controlling the climate in your home. With its sleek design and intuitive controls, it makes it easy to manage your heating and cooling needs while saving on energy costs. Connect it to your smartphone for remote control and energy-saving features.

name: Google Nest Audio Speaker G7654A
description: Immerse yourself in rich, high-quality sound with the Google Nest Audio Speaker G7654A. This smart speaker offers clear and powerful audio for your music, podcasts, and more. It seamlessly integrates with your Google ecosystem and allows you to control your smart home devices with ease. Elevate your audio experience with Google Nest Audio.

name: Google's Fabric VR Headset Based on the Clothes We Love to Wear
description: Experience virtual reality like never before with Google's Fabric VR Headset. Designed to be comfortable and stylish, this VR headset is inspired by the clothes we love to wear. Dive into immersive VR worlds, watch 360-degree videos, and play games with a headset that feels as good as it looks. Discover the future of entertainment with Google Fabric VR.

name: Google Snow Nest Wifi Pro GA03030-US - Rear-2
description: Enhance your home network with the Google Snow Nest Wifi Pro GA03030-US. This high-performance Wi-Fi router ensures fast and reliable internet connectivity throughout your home. Say goodbye to dead zones and enjoy seamless streaming, online gaming, and web browsing. With advanced security features and easy setup, it's the perfect addition to your smart home.

name: Depth Camera D455 – Intel® RealSense™ Depth and Tracking Camera
description: The Depth Camera D455 by Intel is a remarkable RealSense™ depth and tracking camera designed for a wide range of applications. Its advanced depth-sensing technology allows for precise 3D imaging and tracking, making it ideal for robotics, AR/VR, and more. Unlock new possibilities with the Intel D455 camera for depth and tracking.

name: Intel 12th Gen Core i7-12700 Alder Lake Processor
description: Experience the power of Intel's 12th Generation Core i7-12700 Alder Lake Processor. This high-performance CPU is designed to handle demanding tasks with ease, from gaming to content creation. With advanced architecture and enhanced efficiency, it's a game-changer for PC enthusiasts and professionals.

name: Intel Announces 2nd Gen Optane Memory and Storage
description: Intel's latest innovation is here: the 2nd Generation Optane Memory and Storage. Get ready for blazing-fast performance and ultra-responsive storage solutions for your PC. With Optane technology, you can experience quicker boot times, reduced lag, and seamless multitasking. Elevate your computing experience with Intel Optane Memory and Storage.

name: Intel Thunderbolt XW-956A Multi Cables
description: Experience the future of connectivity with Intel Thunderbolt XW-956A Multi Cables. These high-speed cables offer lightning-fast data transfer and high-definition video capabilities. Whether you're connecting displays, external drives, or other peripherals, these Intel Thunderbolt cables ensure reliable and lightning-quick performance.

name: Microsoft Band 2 - Large
description: The Microsoft Band 2 in size Large is the ultimate fitness wearable. It tracks your heart rate, steps, sleep, and more. With a beautiful curved display and a multitude of sensors, it provides real-time data to help you achieve your fitness goals. Stay connected, monitor your health, and achieve your best with the Microsoft Band 2.

name: Microsoft HoloLens MR (Mixed Reality) Development Edition
description: Step into the future with the Microsoft HoloLens Mixed Reality (MR) Development Edition. This groundbreaking device blends the physical and digital worlds, providing a truly immersive experience. Perfect for developers, it unlocks new possibilities in gaming, design, education, and more. Explore the world of holograms and mixed reality like never before.

name: Microsoft Surface Arc Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Sleek, stylish, and highly portable, the Microsoft Surface Arc Wireless Mouse in Black is your perfect travel companion. Its unique design is not only eye-catching but also functional. It snaps flat for easy storage and curves for comfortable use. Whether you're on the go or at your desk, this mouse provides precise control and enhances your productivity.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 8
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 8 is the ultimate 2-in-1 laptop, combining the power of a laptop and the versatility of a tablet. With the latest Intel processors, a brilliant PixelSense display, and all-day battery life, it's perfect for work, creativity, and entertainment. Get the job done with the Surface Pro 8 and experience the best of Microsoft in a single device.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch S760A
description: Elevate your fitness and lifestyle with the Samsung Galaxy Watch S760A. This stylish smartwatch not only tells the time but also tracks your health, fitness, and more. It offers a beautiful AMOLED display, long battery life, and seamless connectivity with your Samsung devices. Stay connected, monitor your activities, and enjoy a world of convenience on your wrist.

name: Samsung Inverter Air Conditioners SA-576A3
description: Beat the heat with Samsung Inverter Air Conditioners SA-576A3. Enjoy efficient cooling with the latest inverter technology, saving energy while maintaining your comfort. This air conditioner provides rapid cooling, customizable settings, and a quiet operation. Stay cool and refreshed, even on the hottest days.

name: Samsung Xpress SL-C480W Color Laser Multifunction Printer
description: Print, scan, and copy with ease using the Samsung Xpress SL-C480W Color Laser Multifunction Printer. This versatile printer is perfect for home or office use. With wireless connectivity, you can print from your smartphone or tablet effortlessly. Experience vibrant color printing and fast, efficient performance with this Samsung printer.

name: Samsung's New Galaxy Phones Ditch Plastic for Metal
description: Experience the future of smartphones with Samsung's new Galaxy phones, now featuring a sleek metal design. These cutting-edge devices combine stunning aesthetics with powerful performance. From the beautiful display to the advanced camera capabilities, Samsung's Galaxy phones offer an unparalleled mobile experience. Say goodbye to plastic and embrace the future with metal.
